name: Questers
description:
Questers is a leader in building and managing dedicated software development operations. Remote or on-site.
Questers is a London-based distributed software development company, integrating processes and services to deliver on organisations’ strategic IT agenda. End-to-end, we design, build and manage dedicated teams over a diverse set of technologies in various industries.
Services
DEDICATED Software Development Teams
BOT (Build-Operate-Transfer) Operations
ON-SITE Development Consulting
What we do
ACCESS top talent through quick on-boarding, competitive and responsible employment
DELIVER high performance ensuring direct project control, excelled process and reduced costs and risk
ENABLE scalability & flexibility by offering bespoke customization and spin-out options
MANAGE security & compliance meeting highest Tier1 requirements and certifications
RUN high-end infrastructure facilitating collaboration between clients and teams in out techpark
BUILD strategic partnerships based on consistency, transparency and trust to deliver on innovation agendas
Why us
EXPERTISE through experience – 10+ years, 100+ clients, 1000+ employees
TRANSPARENCY & differentiation – an efficient alternative to outsourcing & own subsidiary
HIGH performance – proven collaboration platform & excelled delivery
EXCLUSIVITY & focus – No bench, fully customized resourcing & delivery processes
LOW risk – clear terms, flexibility & capped exposure
READ MORE...
